articles.description: The modus operandi of this particular scam involved a fraudster presenting a forged Zerodha employee ID card to a targeted customer, claiming that they had won an award from the renowned financial institution.

articles.content: Amazon Seller Services and the Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI) on Wednesday inked an agreement to boost cargo movement along the Ganga. A pilot programme is set to launch on the Patna-Kolk… [+1796 chars]
